name: Big Energy Index
description: Investments in various oil and energy interests. Donald Trump's portfolio includes companies like Chevron, Energy Transfer Partners, and ConocoPhillips.

name: Private Equity
description: Investments in hedge funds and private equity firms. According to FEC filings, Trump has somewhere between $25 to $50 million invested BlackRock's Obsidian Fund, a fixed-income hedge fund. He also has between $2 and $10 million invested in two Angelo Gordon funds. He has between $3 and $15 million invested in funds managed by John Paulson.

name: Aerospace Firms
description: Companies such as United Technologies, and Lockheed Martin. One of the biggest gainers in Trump's portfolio is Boeing, which earned him 3.96 million dollars in 2014.

name: China
description: An emerging market? Chinese investors are one of the biggest financiers of Donald Trump's business projects, and a major holder of U.S. Debt.

name: Silicon Valley
description: Tech, Internet, and Startups. Donald Trump has previously invested heavily in Facebook, Google, Apple, and Tesla

name: Gold
description: Physical Gold. Great in times of financial instability. On a form submitted in 2015, Donald Trump reported holding an amount of physical gold, valued at between $100,001 to $250,000
